channel.title: Website on RUB - Roscoff Unseminars in Bio*
channel.description: Recent content in Website on RUB - Roscoff Unseminars in Bio*

item.title: Brand new website!
item.description: Here’s the first post of a new website, greatly inspired by the inSileco blog. To know how it was implemented, I suggest you to read the really nice blog post that describes the process we used to build the website. Briefly, it makes use of the R blogdown package, that is a wrapper package creating hugo websites. We are using Github Pages to host the static website, and Travis CI to build the website in a stable environment.
